captions.text:
- We're gonna play a game.
It's called "Never Have I Ever."

I'm gonna ask
a series of questions.
Take one and pass it down.
And I'll play along with you.

and we will all answer
"I have" or "I have never."

"Never ever have I been
to a nude beach."

- All right.
- Okay, put it down.

"Never ever have I gotten
a tattoo that I regret."

"Never ever have I joined
the Mile High Club."

"Never ever have I lied
to get a job."

- I lie constantly
to get a job.

- "Never ever have I gotten out
of a speeding ticket

- "Never ever have I forgotten
the name of a date."

Like--
like while you're with them?

- Yeah, that's difficult.
- While you're with them?

- While you're with them?
- That would be really horrific.

- You've all seen each other
naked.

"Never ever have I lied
on a talk show."
Yeah, no, I haven't done that.

- "Never ever have I said
a baby was cute
